did.unittitle: Men working on a drilling rig, loading and lower sections of pipe; women and men playing cards in a wooded area; drilling rig experiencing a blowout, gas and oil plume; unidentified coal company town, coal-loading conveyor and building, no audio

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Black and white 16mm film, no audio track; runtime: 14:15
